front.title: DIAMETER Application for Mobile-IPv4 and 802.11 Authentication

abstract.t: This document describes a single way to perform both Mobile-IPv4 and 802.11 authentication and key exchanges. Diameter Mobile-IPv4Application can be used to consummate message sequences for both802.11 and Mobile IPv4. It is possible to replace the currently proposed 802.1x Authentication/key-exchange with Diameter Mobile-IPv4 Application.
